content:
I am trying to build the following dockerfile for the https://github.com/encode/starlette.git repository. It should install any necessary dependencies and then run tests to confirm that installation succeeded:
# Use an official Python runtime as a parent image
FROM python:3.9-slim

# Set the working directory to /app
WORKDIR /app

# Copy the entire content of the repo to the container
COPY . /app/

# Install dependencies
RUN scripts/install

# Run the test suite
RUN scripts/test
